description: Trump intends to nominate Rep. Matt Gaetz as attorney general and former Democratic Rep. Tulsi Gabbard as director of national intelligence, surprising many lawmakers who will have to confirm them.
title: "I was shocked." Lawmakers react to Gaetz pick to be Trump's attorney general

description: The posters, which appeared across campus, accuse university faculty of being complicit in war crimes against Palestinians in Gaza. The university president condemned the posters as antisemitic.
title: University of Rochester investigates 'Wanted' posters accusing staff of Gaza war crimes

description: North Korea and Russia each ratified a mutual defense treaty within days of each other. The pact means the countries will defend one another if attacked. And some say it may mean more involvement by North Korea in the war between Russia and Ukraine. We hear about the ramifications from our correspondent in Seoul.
title: Russia and North Korea Vow to Defend One Another

description: Inflation remains substantially lower than it did during its 2022 peak — but Americans are still frustrated with high prices.
title: Fed up with high prices? Here's where things stand with inflation

description: President-elect Donald Trump announced his pick for one of the biggest jobs in his new administration: attorney general. And for that job, Trump has chosen Florida Congressman Matt Gaetz.
title: Trump announces Matt Gaetz as attorney general pick

description: "A Bar Song (Tipsy)" added another week atop the chart, making it the longest-running No. 1 of the decade. In two more weeks, it could tie the all-time record, but a seasonal juggernaut approaches.
title: Shaboozey's 'A Bar Song (Tipsy)' hits another pop chart milestone

description: In a post on Truth Social announcing the nomination of Gaetz, Trump said: "Few issues in America are more important than ending the partisan Weaponization of our Justice System."
title: Trump announces he will nominate Rep. Matt Gaetz to be attorney general

description: In Pittsburgh, entire houses have been converted into individual art installations filled with unusual objects. A new house is now open.
title: Outside: vinyl siding. Inside: a bear

description: President-elect Donald Trump has vowed to "dismantle government bureaucracy," enlisting the help of billionaires to achieve his goals. Federal workers with memories of Trump's first term are scared.
title: 'Apprehensive and fearful': Federal workers await a dismantling under Trump

description: This is likely to be their final meeting before President Biden leaves office. Biden sees it as a chance to reflect on the "tough relationship" between the two countries, an official said.
title: Biden and Xi will meet on Saturday, the 3rd and likely final time during Biden's term

description: Senate Republicans have chosen Sen. John Thune, R-S.D., as the next party leader, launching a new era for the GOP after nearly two decades with Sen. Mitch McConnell, R-Ky., leading the party in the Senate.
title: Republicans choose John Thune as next Senate majority leader

description: With wars raging around the world and high tariffs looming, Economist editor-in-chief Zanny Minton Beddoes says Trump's agenda may be chaotic — but she remains optimistic about possible good elements.
title: From high tariffs to isolation, what a 2nd Trump term might mean for foreign policy

description: A similar hearing last year brought extraordinary moments, including a retired intelligence officer alleging that the U.S. government has recovered nonhuman "biologics" from crash sites.
title: Watch Live: Experts testify at UFO hearing in Congress

description: Birds descended from the dinosaurs, but researchers have known relatively little about how the bird's brain took shape over millions of years. A new fossil sheds light on that mystery.
title: Small fossil has big implications for bird brain evolution

description: Permanent tent cities are another idea Trump has for dealing with people who are unhoused. Sequestering people with mental illness or substance abuse in one place has been tried, an expert says, and "it turns into hell on earth."
title: Trump would like to bring back mental institutions, but experts are skeptical

description: President-elect Donald Trump has made a flurry of announcements about key cabinet members, at least one of which has come as a shock. And, President Biden provides an intimate view of the White House.
title: Analyzing Trump's cabinet picks so far. And, Biden's intimate view of the White House

description: The government in Lahore has closed schools and public spaces and shut down factories. Environmental lawyer Ahmad Rafay Alam shares his perspective: "frustrated" but still fighting.
title: Pakistan's smog is visible from space. This activist is 'frustrated' but won't give up

description: Among the names being floated to head the Department of Health and Human Services are RFK Jr. and Florida Surgeon General Joseph Ladapo. Both are vaccine skeptics, which worries pediatricians.
title: What happens when a vaccine skeptic leads health policy? Ask Florida

description: A neighborhood watch group in a Christian Beirut neighborhood is on the lookout for militant operatives, which could make the area a target for Israeli airstrikes.
title: In Lebanon, residents fear Hezbollah could be hiding among people displaced by war

description: Live bidding will be private, and the future owner of Jones' company will be public once court papers are filed. The proceeds will go to pay Sandy Hook families who won defamation cases against Jones.
title: 'Jump ball' for Alex Jones' media empire as it hits the auction block today

description: The USS Edsall was overpowered by a Japanese fleet in the Indian Ocean but fought valiantly to the end, the U.S. Navy said. It was found in deep waters south of Australia's Christmas Island.
title: The USS Edsall, sunk by Japanese forces in World War II, has been found

description: President Biden called his predecessor — now, successor — a threat to democracy. Today he'll sit side by side with President-elect Trump as part of the ceremony around a smooth transfer of power.
title: Trump meets Biden in the Oval Office today. It's a tradition Trump skipped in 2020

description: Israeli airstrikes killed at least 46 people in the Gaza Strip in the past day, medics said. In Lebanon, warplanes struck Beirut's southern suburbs and killed 33 people in the country on Tuesday.
title: Israeli strikes kill dozens in the Gaza Strip and Lebanon, medics say

description: The shootings were part of a wave of violence that erupted as the country plagued by gang violence swore in its new prime minister after a politically tumultuous process.
title: US prohibits airlines from flying to Haiti after planes were shot by gangs
